title: Fantastic Man Fonts
content:
Jop van Bennekom said he only uses 5 classic fonts for Fantastic Man... anyone know then all?

 [‹ Sister Schubert's font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131114/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46971 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone know of a similar font to this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131114/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46954 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Matthew_Angel

comments.content: It’s one of the sans-serif ones that I’m after in particular... not Gill though.

Looks like [Sackers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131114/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/sackers-gothic/medium/), with that slightly squashed-looking S.

[http://www.fantasticmanmagazine.com/index-flash.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131114/http:/www.fantasticmanmagazine.com/index-flash.html)
